descriptions.description: The libgsf package contains the library used for providing an extensible input/output abstraction layer for structured file formats.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=libgsf PACKAGE_VERSION=1.14.29
oegimport libxml2 # required: libxml2-2.9.1 oegimport glib # required: GLib-2.36.3 oegimport intltool # required: Intltool-0.50.2 #oegimport gdk-pixbuf # recommended: gdk-pixbuf-2.28.2 (To build gsf-office-thumbnailer) #oegimport gobject-introspection # optional: gobject-introspection-1.36.0 #oegimport gtkdoc # optional: GTK-Doc-1.19 #oegimport libiconv #oegimport gettext
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.xz
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin/*.dll bin64/ rm -rf bin # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
